channel.title: Right Click Bug With Big Client
channel.description: Ok, so i resized a divine client, and i have a right click bug i tried to fix but i cant can someone help?

ow sorry, all thanks to adu for helping on fix the rightclick bug

item.title: Right Click Bug With Big Client
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“Po!ntles$, post:9, topic:228511”]if you are using rscd v25 this will work for the rightclick bug not to sure about demonik,

to fix the right click bug go into mudclient and search for mouseButtonClick find this:

 [code]         menuX = super.mouseX - menuWidth / 2;
            menuY = super.mouseY - 7;
            showRightClickMenu = true;
            if (menuX < 0)
                menuX = 0;
            if (menuY < 0)
                menuY = 0;
            if (menuX + menuWidth > 510)
                menuX = 510 - menuWidth;
            if (menuY + menuHeight > 315)
                menuY = 315 - menuHeight;
            mouseButtonClick = 0;[/code]

and change the menuwidth and menuheight so it match with the resize[/quote]

Fine, dont thank me lol Jk

Read full topic
item.source: Right Click Bug With Big Client

item.title: Right Click Bug With Big Client
item.dc:creator: @Po_ntles Po!ntles$
item.description:
@Po_ntles wrote:

if you are using rscd v25 this will work for the rightclick bug not to sure about demonik,

to fix the right click bug go into mudclient and search for mouseButtonClick find this:

 [code]         menuX = super.mouseX - menuWidth / 2;
            menuY = super.mouseY - 7;
            showRightClickMenu = true;
            if (menuX < 0)
                menuX = 0;
            if (menuY < 0)
                menuY = 0;
            if (menuX + menuWidth > 510)
                menuX = 510 - menuWidth;
            if (menuY + menuHeight > 315)
                menuY = 315 - menuHeight;
            mouseButtonClick = 0;[/code]

and change the menuwidth and menuheight so it match with the resize

Read full topic

define “bug”
[/quote]Sometimes it doesn’t work, like when you attempt to right click an npc it doesn’t show up sometimes.

And when you go to a shop it has unhandled packets
I think you have to fix this in the gameimagemiddleman.java and gameimage.java and stuff[/quote]I don’t have those bugs, maybe because I’m using rscd v25. Are you using demonik?
